titles.title: Christ The Lord Is Risen Today

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Christ the Lord is risen today, Hallelujah. Sons of men and angels say, Hallelujah. Raise your joys and triumphs high, Hallelujah. Sing, ye heavens, and earth, reply Hallelujah.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lives again our glorious King, Hallelujah. Where, oh death, is now thy sting? Hallelujah. Once He died our souls to save, Hallelujah. Where thy victory, Oh grave? Hallelujah.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Loveâ€™s redeeming work is done, Hallelujah. Fought the fight, the battle won, Hallelujah. Death in vain forbids Him rise, Hallelujah. Christ hath opened paradise. Hallelujah.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Soar we now where Christ hath led, Hallelujah. Following our exalted head, Hallelujah. Made like Him, like Him we rise, Hallelujah. Ours the cross, the grave, the skies Hallelujah.{/lang-eng}
